workflow.name: Generate Shopify product listings from images with Gemini AI and Airtable
workflow.description:
# Shopify Digital Product Automation
(from just and image to complete Shopify product page.)

This **Shopify Digital Product Automation** is an advanced **n8n-powered workflow** that leverages **AI (Google Gemini)**, **Airtable**, and **Shopify API** to generate product details from images and automatically post them to Shopify. It fully automates the process ‚Äî from uploading images to publishing Shopify products ‚Äî with minimal manual effort.  

---

## üí° Key Advantages
Our Shopify Digital Product Automation offers five core advantages:

- üîó **Shopify Product Sync** ‚Äî Automatically posts product details including title, description, SEO fields, and matched category to Shopify.  
- ‚úçÔ∏è **AI-Powered Product Generation** ‚Äî Gemini analyzes uploaded images and generates engaging, SEO-friendly product titles, descriptions, and metadata.  
- üóÇÔ∏è **Structured Output** ‚Äî Outputs JSON-ready product data compatible with Shopify, ensuring smooth automation.  
- üìÑ **Airtable Integration** ‚Äî Tracks uploaded images, analyzed data, and generated products to prevent duplication.  
- üì§ **End-to-End Automation** ‚Äî Handles the complete workflow from image upload to Shopify posting without manual intervention.  

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è How It Works
The workflow follows a **step-by-step automated process**:

### Step-by-Step Process
1. **Upload Images** ‚Äì Add your digital artwork or poster images to Google Drive and record them in Airtable.  
2. **Image Analysis** ‚Äì AI fetches new images and analyzes visual elements like characters, series, poster text, and style.  
3. **Store Analysis Results** ‚Äì Updates analyzed data in Airtable and marks images as `Used`.  
4. **Fetch Shopify Collections** ‚Äì Retrieves current collections from your Shopify store for category matching.  
5. **Generate Product Details** ‚Äì Gemini generates product title, description, matched category, SEO page title, meta description, and URL handle.  
6. **Save Generated Products** ‚Äì Stores generated product details in Airtable and marks them as `generated`.  
7. **Post Products to Shopify** ‚Äì Automatically creates new products in Shopify using the API.  
8. **Update Status** ‚Äì Marks products as `posted` in Airtable after successful posting.  

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup Steps

### Required Node Configuration
To implement this workflow, configure the following n8n nodes:

- **Trigger Node** ‚Äì Start workflow manually or via scheduler.  
- **Airtable Node** ‚Äì Fetch raw images and store processed product details.  
- **Google Drive Node** ‚Äì Access image files.  
- **HTTP Request Node** ‚Äì Fetch Shopify collections.  
- **Code Node** ‚Äì Refine AI outputs and format product data.  
- **Split & Limit Nodes** ‚Äì Process images and products in batches.  
- **LangChain / Gemini Node** ‚Äì Generate product titles, descriptions, and SEO data.  
- **Shopify Node** ‚Äì Create products via Shopify API.  
- **Status Update Node** ‚Äì Update Airtable with processing and posting status.  

---

### üîê Credentials Required
Before running the workflow, ensure you have the following credentials configured:

- **Shopify Access Token** ‚Äì For posting products and fetching collections.  
- **Gemini API Key** ‚Äì For AI-powered product generation.  
- **Airtable API Key** ‚Äì For storing and tracking workflow data.  
- **Google Drive OAuth** ‚Äì To access image files.  

---

## üë§ Ideal For
This automation workflow is designed for:

- Shopify store owners managing hundreds of digital products  
- Ecommerce teams automating product listings  
- Marketing teams needing scalable, AI-driven product content workflows  

---

## üí¨ Bonus Tip
The workflow is **fully modular** and customizable. You can extend it to:  

- Automatically assign prices or discounts  
- Multi-language product description generation  
- Social media promotion of new products  
- Email campaign integration  

All extensions can be implemented within the **same n8n flow**, making it a complete digital product automation solution.

parameters.text:
=# Role:
You are an expert AI image analyst specialized in digital posters and artwork content.

# Instruction:
Analyze the digital poster and provide all relevant details about the characters, series, style, text, and visual mood in structured JSON format. Focus only on the artwork content.


# Restriction:
## Ignore all background elements, shadows, frames, walls, furniture, or any photography/mockup context.
- Do not make assumptions beyond what is visible in the poster.
- If a specific detail is missing or unclear, use null.
- Avoid hallucinations or adding fictional content. Focus only on observable details.

# Output Structure:
## Output must be valid JSON with the following keys:

## Example Output:
{
  "character_name": "Monkey D. Luffy",
  "series_name": "One Piece",
  "category": "anime",
  "poster_text": "Friendship is the most precious treasure, and chasing dreams is the meaning of life",
  "poster_type": "motivational"
}

# Hallucination Avoidance Rule:
- Only include elements that are visibly present in the poster.
- Do not infer names, series, or text if not clearly visible.
- Do not describe the environment, room, frame, or mockup context.
- If unsure, return null rather than guessing.

messageValues.message:
=You are a Shopify product content generator AI.  
Your task is to take structured analyzed image data (JSON format) and generate **Shopify product details**.

### Input Data Example:
{
  "character_name": "Naruto",
  "series_name": "Naruto",
  "category": "anime",
  "poster_text": "I never go back on my word! That's my nind≈ç: my ninja way.",
  "poster_type": "motivational"
}

### Available Categories/Collections:
Category Title : {{ $('refine_collection_output').item.json.title }}
Category id : {{ $('refine_collection_output').item.json.id }}

### Output Rules:
- Always respond in **valid JSON format only**.  
- Use the `series_name` and `character_name` in `product_title` if available.  
- If no character/series, create a general title using poster_type and poster_text keywords.  
- `product_description` must be 4‚Äì6 sentences, engaging, and SEO-friendly.  
- Select the most relevant `product_category` from the available categories.  
- Add `"matched_category_id"` to match `product_category`.  
- `SEL_page_title` must be catchy within 70 characters.  
- `SEL_meta_description` must be engaging within 160 characters.  
- `SEL_url_handle` must be SEO-friendly (lowercase + hyphens).  

### Output JSON Structure:
{
  "product_title": "",
  "matched_category": "",
  "matched_category_id": "",
  "product_description": "",
  "product_category": "",
  "SEL_page_title": "",
  "SEL_meta_description": "",
  "SEL_url_handle": ""
}

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "product_title": "Naruto Motivational Anime Poster - Ninja Way",
  "matched_category": "Anime",
  "matched_category_id": "320625541282",
  "product_description": "Bring home the spirit of Naruto Uzumaki with this motivational anime poster. Featuring his iconic quote about never giving up, it‚Äôs the perfect wall art for fans and dreamers.",
  "product_category": "Anime Posters",
  "SEL_page_title": "Naruto Motivational Anime Poster - Ninja Way",
  "SEL_meta_description": "Shop this Naruto motivational anime poster featuring his nind≈ç quote. Perfect wall decor for anime fans and dreamers.",
  "SEL_url_handle": "naruto-motivational-anime-poster-ninja-way"
}

parameters.content:
# Digital Art to Shopify Automation

## Overview :
This template automates the process of turning digital art files into fully structured Shopify products using n8n, OpenAI, Airtable, Google Drive, and Shopify. The workflow fetches raw digital artwork, analyzes it for categories and descriptions using AI, generates SEO-optimized product content, and posts it to Shopify.

## Ideal for : 
Digital artists, print-on-demand sellers, e-commerce store managers, and anyone looking to automate Shopify product creation for digital art.

## SEO Keywords : 
Digital art automation, Shopify product creation, n8n workflow template, AI image analysis, Airtable to Shopify integration, OpenAI product description generator, automated e-commerce workflow.



# User Guide
This workflow automates image analysis, product detail generation, and Shopify product posting.

---
## Step 1: Upload Images
- Upload your digital artwork or poster images to **Google Drive**.  
- In **Airtable Raw Image Table**, add new entries with:
  - `drive_file_id` ‚Üí Google Drive file ID  
  - `status` ‚Üí set as `Unused`  

---
## Step 2: Image Analysis (Subworkflow 1)
- Fetch `Unused` images from Airtable.  
- Download images from Google Drive.  
- AI analyzes images to extract:
  - Characters
  - Series
  - Poster text
  - Style
  - Category
  - Visual mood  
- Updates analyzed data back to Airtable.  
- Marks the image `Used` after processing.  

---
## Step 3: Product Generation (Subworkflow 2)
- Fetch analyzed image data from Airtable.  
- Retrieve available Shopify collections for your store.  
- AI generates Shopify-ready product details:
  - `product_title`
  - `product_description` (SEO-friendly, 4‚Äì6 sentences)
  - `product_category` and matched collection ID
  - SEO fields: `SEL_page_title`, `SEL_meta_description`, `SEL_url_handle`  
- Updates generated product details in Airtable and marks as `generated`.  

---
## Step 4: Posting Products to Shopify
- Fetch `generated` product details from Airtable.  
- Automatically create products in Shopify using the API.  
- Update Airtable product status to `posted` once successfully added.  

---
## Step 5: Batch Processing & Automation
- Workflow processes images and products in **batches** for efficiency.  
- Can be triggered automatically via schedule or webhook.

# Digital Image Analysis

## Purpose:
Automatically fetch raw digital images, analyze their content using AI, and update the results in Airtable for further processing.

## How It Works:
This workflow retrieves all unused images from Airtable, downloads them from Google Drive, and uses an AI model to analyze key details 
like characters, series, category, poster text, and type. After analysis, the results are updated back into Airtable, and images are 
marked as processed, creating a seamless loop for continuous image handling.

# Shopify Product Creation

## Purpose:
Convert AI-analyzed image data into structured Shopify product details and post them automatically to your Shopify store.

## How It Works:
Here we will fetch analyzed image data from Airtable.
It retrieves available Shopify collections to match products with the most relevant category.

## AI (LLM) generates structured product details including:
- Product title
- Description (SEO-friendly and engaging)
- Product category and matched collection ID
- SEO metadata (page title, meta description, URL handle)
Generated product details are updated back into Airtable.

## The workflow then posts the product to Shopify automatically.
Finally, the workflow updates the product status in Airtable to indicate it has been posted.

# Author Details

## Manish Kumar
### Expert Designer & Automation Engineer for Custom Shopify Apps

I specialize in designing seamless customer experiences and automating workflows for Shopify, web, and business platforms. From custom apps integration to process optimization, my solutions empower teams to work smarter and scale faster.

## Contact:
### üìß [manipritraj@gmail.com](mailto:manipritraj@gmail.com)
### üìû +91-9334888899

get_analyzed_row2.product_title: Motivational Poster: Perseverance is the Key to Strength
get_analyzed_row2.SEL_page_title: Perseverance is Key | Motivational Strength Poster
get_analyzed_row2.product_description: Unlock your potential with this powerful motivational poster featuring the timeless message: "Perseverance is the key to strength." This inspiring piece serves as a daily reminder that true power comes from unwavering dedication and never giving up on your goals. Perfect for any aspiring individual, whether you're a student, professional, or simply seeking daily encouragement. Let its profound wisdom fuel your resolve and inspire you to overcome any challenge. Elevate your workspace, bedroom, or living area with this high-quality, thought-provoking design.
get_analyzed_row2.SEL_meta_description: Inspire your journey with our 'Perseverance is the Key to Strength' motivational poster. A powerful reminder to stay strong and achieve your goals. Perfect for any space!

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
